document.discussion_title: Luna Innovations Inc. (LUNA) Downgraded by Zacks Investment Research to “Sell”
document.topic_text: Tweet Zacks Investment Research lowered shares of Luna Innovations Inc. (NASDAQ:LUNA) from a hold rating to a sell rating in a report released on Tuesday. According to Zacks, “LUNA INNOVATIONS INCORPORATED develops and manufactures new-generation products for the healthcare, telecommunications, energy and defense markets. Luna develops technologies in four primary areas: Sensors & Systems; Health Sciences; Materials & Secure Computing. Luna’s product offerings generally fit into two categories: Instrumentation, Test & Measurement & Healthcare. The products are used to measure, monitor, protect and improve critical processes in the markets we serve. Through its disciplined commercialization business model, Luna has become a recognized leader in transitioning science to solutions. Luna is headquartered in Roanoke, Virginia. “ Separately, TheStreet raised shares of Luna Innovations from a sell rating to a hold rating in a research report on Wednesday, August 10th. In other Luna Innovations news, Director Richard Roedel purchased 39,200 shares of Luna Innovations stock in a transaction on Wednesday, June 15th. The shares were purchased at an average cost of $1.18 per share, with a total value of $46,256.00. The acquisition was disclosed in a legal filing with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which can be accessed through this link . Luna Innovations ( NASDAQ:LUNA ) opened at 1.12 on Tuesday. Luna Innovations has a 12 month low of $0.74 and a 12 month high of $1.61. The firm’s 50-day moving average is $1.29 and its 200 day moving average is $1.10. The stock has a market capitalization of $31.02 million and a P/E ratio of 6.44. Luna Innovations (NASDAQ:LUNA) last announced its quarterly earnings results on Tuesday, August 9th. The company reported ($0.03) earnings per share for the quarter, missing analysts’ consensus estimates of ($0.01) by $0.02. On average, equities analysts anticipate that Luna Innovations will post ($0.09) earnings per share for the current year. Luna Innovations Incorporated develops, manufactures and markets fiber optic sensing and test, and measurement products. The Company is focused on bringing technology solutions to measure and monitor processes in the aerospace, automotive, energy, composite, telecommunications and defense industries. Get a free copy of the Zacks research report on Luna Innovations (LUNA) For more information about research offerings from Zacks Investment Research, visit Zacks.com Luna Innovations Inc. Luna Innovations Inc.
